data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Naâma, Algeria a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Naâma, Algeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Naâma, Algeria, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1461 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Naâma, Algeria to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 192,900 people living in Naâma, Algeria. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Berber, Menasser people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Naâma.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Naâma, Algeria to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Naâma who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
